attributes.action: keep free parking facilities for the disabled at Coventry University Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free charges were successfully negotiated 9 months ago, but this has recently been overturned.  A full days parking at the hospital will cost £10. Over 6000 people signed the original petition to have the free parking facility at the hospital, less than a year ago!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
